title: WandaVision
description: Wanda Maximoff and Vision navigate the challenges of suburban life in a series of sitcom-inspired episodes.

title: The Falcon and the Winter Soldier
description: Sam Wilson and Bucky Barnes team up to confront a new threat in the wake of Captain America's legacy.

title: Loki
description: Loki, the God of Mischief, finds himself in a mysterious organization that monitors timelines.

title: Hawkeye
description: Clint Barton teams up with Kate Bishop to confront enemies from his past during the holiday season.

title: Ms. Marvel
director: Adil El Arbi, Bilall Fallah, and others
description: Kamala Khan, a Pakistani-American teenager, discovers her superpowers and navigates her identity.

title: She-Hulk: Attorney at Law
description: Jennifer Walters, a lawyer and cousin of Bruce Banner, becomes the She-Hulk and tackles legal cases involving superhumans.
